INSERT
func:
var nameDB='data';
var name = msg.topic; //     
var simpletime=global.get('simpletime'); //     MYSQL
var temp = msg.payload; //   
query = `INSERT INTO `+nameDB+` (name,value, time) VALUES ('`+name+`',`+temp+`,'`+simpletime+`');`; // 
msg.topic = query; //   
return msg; //

name: UPDATE
func:
var nameDB='data';
var name = msg.topic; //     
var simpletime=global.get('simpletime'); //     MYSQL
var temp = msg.payload; //   
query = `UPDATE `+nameDB+` SET value = '`+temp+`' WHERE name ='`+name+`';`; // 
msg.topic = query; //   
return msg; //

name: SELECT
func:
var nameDB='data';
var name = msg.topic; //     
query = `SELECT * FROM `+nameDB+` WHERE name='`+name+`';`; // 
msg.topic = query; //   
return msg; //
